content: Hi all, this is Lorenzo from Hook. We're looking for FHIR freelance devs to hire to expand our team! We're soon starting a project for a new platform at Hook! Please message me or email me at lorenzo@hook.md if you're interested or know someone who may be interested! Thanks!

@Lorenzo Granato Please don't use #Announcements for "help wanted". Instead, send a PM to Grahame Grieve and he will post in #work opportunities, which is the appropriate place for such posts. (Further questions/comments on #implementers rather than here.)
